alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms near Monida Pass moving southeast toward Spencer and Kilgore through 315 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Monida to 7 miles northwest of Spencer. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, pea sized hail, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Idmon, Spencer, Kilgore, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Sheridan Reservoir, Humphrey and Harriman State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Upper Snake River Plain
